runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus   adaptive damage   (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.
runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.

runes.longDesc: Gain [60% - 90%] (Melee) or [30% - 54%] (Ranged) Attack Speed for 6 seconds when you attack an enemy champion. This effect stacks up to 6 times.  While this effect fully stacked, your Attack Speed can exceed 2.5 and you gain 50 Attack Range.
runes.name: Lethal Tempo
runes.shortDesc: Gain Attack Speed when attacking an enemy champion, stacking up to 6 times. At max stacks, gain Attack Range and remove your Attack Speed limit.

runes.longDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized  Energized attacks heal you for 10 - 100 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant  20% Move Speed  for 1s.  Healing from minions is 10% effective for Ranged Champions, and 20% effective for Melee Champions.
runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

runes.longDesc: Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 5s, gaining 2-4.5   Adaptive Force   per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.  When fully stacked, heal for 8% of the damage you deal to champions (5% for ranged champions).
runes.name: Conqueror
runes.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.

runes.longDesc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield for 20 to 300 health, based on level.  Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.
runes.name: Overheal
runes.shortDesc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.

runes.longDesc: Takedowns restore 10% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.      'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'  â€”Noxian Reckoner
runes.name: Triumph
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 10% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.

runes.longDesc: Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.  Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.
runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.shortDesc: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.

runes.longDesc: Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every  Legend  stack ( max 10 stacks ).  Earn progress toward  Legend  stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.

runes.longDesc: Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 1.5% for every  Legend  stack ( max 10 stacks ).  Earn progress toward  Legend  stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
runes.name: Legend: Tenacity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.

runes.longDesc: Gain 0.4% Life Steal for every  Legend  stack ( max 15 stacks ). At maximum  Legend  stacks, gain 100 max health.  Earn progress toward  Legend  stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Life Steal, up to a cap. Once the cap is reached, increase your max health. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.

runes.longDesc: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.
runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.

runes.longDesc: Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.   Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.
runes.name: Cut Down
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.

runes.longDesc: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.
runes.name: Last Stand
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

runes.longDesc: Hitting a champion with 3  separate  attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus   adaptive damage  .  Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.  Cooldown: 25 - 20s    'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'
runes.name: Electrocute
runes.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

runes.longDesc: Enchants your boots with the active effect ' Predator .'  Gain increased Move Speed, ramping up to 25-50% Move Speed over 1 second, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 20-180 (+ 0.25  bonus AD)(+ 0.15  AP) bonus   adaptive damage  .  Cooldown: 120s-60s.
runes.name: Predator
runes.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

runes.longDesc: Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals  adaptive damage  and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.  Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP) Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)
runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.

runes.longDesc: Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.  No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.  Cooldown: 12s.   Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1. Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
runes.name: Hail of Blades
runes.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.

runes.longDesc: Damaging champions with  impaired movement or actions  deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).  Cooldown: 4s  Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.
runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.shortDesc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

runes.longDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.  Healing: 16-30 (+0.15 bonus AD, +0.08 AP) health (based on level)  Cooldown: 20s
runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.shortDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

runes.longDesc: After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 9 Lethality and 7 Magic Penetration for 5s.  Cooldown: 4s
runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.shortDesc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.

runes.longDesc: Takedowns  on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.  Gain an   adaptive   bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.   After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.  Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.
runes.name: Zombie Ward
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.

runes.longDesc: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 90s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.  Gain an   adaptive   bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.   After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.
runes.name: Ghost Poro
runes.shortDesc: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.

runes.longDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an   adaptive   bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.   Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an   adaptive   bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.  Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.
runes.name: Eyeball Collection
runes.shortDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.

runes.longDesc: Gain an additional  70 gold  the next time you collect a  Bounty Hunter  stack. Increase the gold gained by  20 gold  for each  Bounty Hunter  stack, up to  150 gold .   Bounty Hunter  stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
runes.name: Treasure Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant additional gold the first time they are collected.

runes.longDesc: Gain  20   Item Haste  plus an additional  6   Item Haste  per  Bounty Hunter  stack (includes Trinkets).   Bounty Hunter  stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.   Item Haste affects all items with cooldowns.
runes.name: Ingenious Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent Item Haste (includes Trinkets).

runes.longDesc: Gain  5 Move Speed  out of combat plus  8  per  Bounty Hunter  stack.   Bounty Hunter  stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.

runes.longDesc: Your ultimate gains  6  Ability Haste, plus an additional  5  Ability Haste per  Bounty Hunter  stack.   Bounty Hunter  stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
runes.name: Ultimate Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.

runes.longDesc: Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+ 0.1 AP ) (+ 0.15 bonus AD ).  Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 30 - 75 based on level (+ 0.22 AP ) (+ 0.35 bonus AD ).  Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.
runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

runes.longDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.    Adaptive Damage  : 30 - 100 based on level ( +0.2 AP  and  +0.35 bonus AD ) Cooldown: 20 - 8s   Cooldown Reduction: Single Target: 20%. Area of Effect: 10%. Damage over Time: 5%.
runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.

runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or  separate  abilities within 4s grants  15 - 40% Move Speed  based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.  This is increased to  30 - 60% Move Speed  for Melee champions. Duration: 3s Cooldown: 30s - 10s
runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.

runes.longDesc: When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 35 - 110 magic damage based on level ( +0.09 AP  and  +0.14 bonus AD ) for 4s.  Cooldown: 60s
runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.  After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.  Cooldown: 15 seconds
runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

runes.longDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a  Move Speed  increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.  Increase:  5% - 25% Move Speed  based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more  Move Speed ).
runes.name: Nimbus Cloak
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.

runes.longDesc: Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels: Level 5: +5  Ability Haste   Level 8: +5  Ability Haste   Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDesc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

runes.longDesc: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain  1% Move Speed .
runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDesc: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

runes.longDesc: While above 70% health, gain an   adaptive   bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).   Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.
runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.

runes.longDesc: Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 20 - 40 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.  Cooldown: 10s
runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDesc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.

runes.longDesc: Gain  25 Move Speed  and an   adaptive   bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.     May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.
runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDesc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.

runes.longDesc: Every 10 min gain AP or AD,   adaptive  .   10 min : + 8 AP or 5 AD   20 min : + 24 AP or 14 AD  30 min : + 48 AP or 29 AD  40 min : + 80 AP or 48 AD  50 min : + 120 AP or 72 AD  60 min : + 168 AP or 101 AD etc...
runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.

runes.longDesc: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby champions, creating frozen zones for 3 (+ 100% of the immobilizing effect's duration) seconds that slow enemies for 30% (+9% per 10% Heal and Shield Power) (+3% per 100 Ability Power) (+4% per 100 bonus Attack Damage) and reduce their damage by 15% against your allies (not including yourself).   Cooldown: 25s
runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays that slow nearby enemies and reduce their damage to your allies.

runes.longDesc: Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).   Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.    Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.  After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again. Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.
runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.

runes.longDesc: Attacks or abilities against an enemy champion within 0.25s of entering champion combat grants 5 gold and  First Strike  for 3 seconds, causing you to deal  9%  extra   damage  against champions, and granting  100% (70% for ranged champions)  of bonus damage dealt as  gold .  Cooldown:  25 - 15 s
runes.name: First Strike
runes.shortDesc: When you initiate champion combat, deal 9% extra damage for 3 seconds and gain gold based on damage dealt.

runes.longDesc: While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by  Hexflash .   Hexflash : Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.  Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.
runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.

runes.longDesc: You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.  Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional  10 Move Speed .
runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.

runes.longDesc: Begin the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Each takedown you acquire reduces this timer by 120 seconds.  Stopwatch can be used for a one time 2.5 second Stasis effect.
runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDesc:
Gain a free Commencing Stopwatch. After 14 minutes, it can be used for a one time Stasis effect.

Each takedown you get shortens this timer by 120 seconds.

runes.longDesc: You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.  Lending Fee: 50 gold
runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.

runes.longDesc: Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 180s of the game.  Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +6% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +3% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.
runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.

runes.longDesc: Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.  Biscuits restore 8% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 40.    Manaless:  Champions without mana restore 12% missing health instead.
runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.

runes.longDesc: + 18  Summoner Spell Haste + 10  Item Haste
runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste

runes.longDesc: Gain  7.5% Move Speed  towards nearby enemy champions that are movement impaired. This bonus is increased to  15% Move Speed  for any enemy champion that you impair.   Activation Range for CC from allies: 1000
runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.

runes.longDesc: Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 30% of its health or mana restoration immediately. In addition, gain  2% Move Speed  while under their effects.
runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDesc: Potions and biscuits grant some restoration immediately. Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>  while under their effects.

runes.longDesc: Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will: Deal bonus magic damage equal to 3.5% of your max health  Heals you for 1.7% of your max health  Permanently increase your health by 5    Ranged Champions:  Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.
runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

runes.longDesc: After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.  Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health) Cooldown: 20s  Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)
runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.

runes.longDesc: Guard  allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While  Guarding , if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the  Guard , both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.  Cooldown:  90 - 40  seconds Shield:  45 - 120  +  12.5%  of your ability power +  8%  of your bonus health Proc Threshold:  90 - 250  postmitigation damage
runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.

runes.longDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 3s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 100 (+35% of your max health) bonus physical damage.   Cooldown: 45s
runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

runes.longDesc: Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.  Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 0.9% of your max health over 2s.
runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.

runes.longDesc: While shielded, gain  1 - 10  Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.  Whenever you gain a new shield,  your next basic attack against a champion deals  5 - 30   (+1.5% Bonus Health)   (+8.5% New Shield Amount)  bonus   adaptive   damage.  You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.
runes.name: Shield Bash
runes.shortDesc: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.

runes.longDesc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your bonus Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.
runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your bonus Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.

runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +3 over 10s.
runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.

runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.   Duration: 1.5s Cooldown: 55s
runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.shortDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s

runes.longDesc: Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.  When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.
runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.

runes.longDesc: Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.  Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

runes.longDesc: Gain 5% Tenacity and 5% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.
runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.
